gobblin.writer

Class HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.writer.FsDataWriter<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      • gobblin.writer.HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gobblin.util.FinalState, gobblin.writer.DataWriter<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter
extends FsDataWriter<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    An extension to FsDataWriter that writes Writable records using an OutputFormat that implements HiveOutputFormat. The records are written using a FileSinkOperator.RecordWriter created by HiveOutputFormat.getHiveRecordWriter(JobConf, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path, Class, boolean, java.util.Properties, org.apache.hadoop.util.Progressable).
